name: Jean-Eudes Assogba
description: I design and develop high-quality, modern, and scalable web applications.

about.intro: I'm Jean-Eudes Assogba, a full-stack software engineer specializing in high-performance web applications, AI-powered tools, and seamless user experiences. I combine strong backend architecture with sleek, scalable frontends using React, TypeScript, Django, Python, and modern AI APIs.
about.approach: I build systems that are fast, stable, and production-ready — whether it's an intelligent expert marketplace, a real-time dashboard, or an AI-enhanced platform. My approach is clear: ship clean code, prioritize UX, and solve real problems with precision.
about.experience: From startups to solo projects, I've delivered robust, maintainable solutions across multiple stacks — all showcased on my GitHub. I'm currently open to full-time remote roles where innovation, execution, and engineering excellence meet.

experiences.title: AI Engineering Intern
experiences.description: Refactored Voiceflow-based cost estimation logic, boosting pricing accuracy from 60% to 81%. Improved user completion rates by 40% and collaborated cross-functionally under fast-paced agile cycles.
experiences.ariaLabel: AI Engineering Intern at PM-Accelerator (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Built a Club Management System adopted by 10+ clubs and 2,000+ students. Integrated automated event scheduling and real-time announcements, increasing student engagement by 50%.
experiences.ariaLabel: Frontend Developer at RDU, TRNC (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer
experiences.description: Led development of a financial dashboard reducing transaction processing time by 55%. Enhanced support systems, cutting helpdesk wait times by 75%.
experiences.ariaLabel: Full-Stack Developer at RDU, TRNC (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
experiences.description: Delivered 20+ websites and web apps across e-commerce, portfolios, and SaaS. Migrated legacy stacks, built custom CMS tools, and increased client sales through SEO-optimized UX.
experiences.ariaLabel: Freelance Full-Stack Developer at Independent (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: Teaching Assistant
experiences.description: Tutored 500+ students in C++ and software fundamentals. Boosted class performance from 65% to 94% via live code reviews and guided practice.
experiences.ariaLabel: Teaching Assistant at RDU, TRNC (opens in a new tab)

experiences.title: IBM Certified Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Completed 100+ hours of real-world projects using React, Django, Flask, and Docker. Gained full-stack cloud deployment expertise across multiple stacks.
experiences.ariaLabel: IBM Certified Full Stack Developer at Coursera (opens in a new tab)

list.title: RenoSmarter.ai – Voiceflow Cost Estimator
list.description: AI-driven home renovation cost estimation app built with Voiceflow, Airtable, and Python. Enhanced pricing logic from 60% to 81% accuracy and boosted completion rates by 40%.

list.title: BrollyHub – AI Expert Marketplace
list.description: GPT-powered platform for expert booking, smart offers, file shelves, calendar sync, and real-time chat/video calls. Serves 500+ users with seamless AI integration.

list.title: Aveem University System
list.description: Full ERP for academic operations across finance, grading, and notifications for 2,000+ users. Built with React, Django, and PostgreSQL, deployed on AWS EC2.

list.title: Dynamiqtec – AI-Powered Blog
list.description: Minimalist, multilingual personal blog and portfolio site with blazing-fast MDX content and Gemma-based translation via API.

list.title: Spotter – Trip Planner App
list.description: AI-assisted travel planner that helps users create, organize, and visualize trips interactively. Built with React and deployed on Vercel.

list.title: Bookify – AI Book Recommendation App
list.description: Book discovery and recommendation web app with real-time search across 10,000+ titles. Built using Django and React.

list.title: Sentifeel – AI Sentiment Classifier
list.description: GPT-4-powered web classifier achieving 90% accuracy on 5K+ text entries. Built with React for a sleek and fast UI.

list.title: Readme Converter – Markdown to PDF
list.description: Developer-focused SPA for converting markdown to PDF/HTML with live preview and export capabilities.

list.title: Personalized AI Chat Assistant
list.description: Conversational AI assistant built with React and OpenAI APIs. Supports context awareness and multi-turn interactions.

list.title: Journal PWA – Offline Notes App
list.description: Progressive Web App for journaling and note-taking, supporting offline sync, secure storage, and a clean mobile interface.
